text: Antônio Lima dos Santos (18 January 1942 - 3 February 2025) was a Brazilian football player. He played for Brazil national team. ==Death== Lima died on 3 February 2025 at a hospital in Santos, São Paulo from heart and kidney failure at the age of 83. ==Club career statistics== |- |1971||rowspan="3"|Santos||rowspan="3"|Série A||7||1 |- |1972||0||0 |- |1973||0||0 |- |1974||Fluminense||Série A||3||0 |- |1975||rowspan="2"|Portuguesa Desportos||rowspan="2"|Série A||0||0 |- |1976||0||0 10||1 10||1 |} ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from renal failure
title: Lima (footballer, born 1942)
